languages.text: "Архивы будут опечатаны и переправлены на твой корабль под визой Инквизиции — для дальнейшего изучения и оценки. Эмелина... моя ответственность".
"The archives will be sealed and transported to your ship as the official property of the Inquisition — for further study and appraisal. Emelina... is my responsibility."
languages.original_text: "Архивы будут опечатаны и переправлены на твой корабль под визой Инквизиции — для дальнейшего изучения и оценки. Эмелина... моя ответственность".

traits.locale_text: "The archives will be sealed and transported to your ship as the official property of the Inquisition — for further study and appraisal. Emelina... is my responsibility."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The archives will be sealed and transported to your ship as the official property of the Inquisition — for further study and appraisal. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: "The archives will be sealed and transported to your ship as the official property of the Inquisition — for further study and appraisal. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: "The archives will be sealed and transported to your ship as the official property of the Inquisition — for further study and appraisal. Emelina... is my responsibility."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “那些资料会被运到你的船上，作为审判庭的官方财产封存起来，等待进一步研究与鉴定。至于艾米莉娜……由我负责。”
languages.original_text: "The archives will be sealed and transported to your ship as the official property of the Inquisition — for further study and appraisal. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: “那些资料会被运到你的船上，作为审判庭的官方财产封存起来，等待进一步研究与鉴定。至于艾米莉娜……由我负责。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Los archivos se sellarán y se transportarán a su nave como propiedad oficial de la Inquisición, para su estudio y evaluación en detalle. Emelina... es responsabilidad mía».
languages.original_text: "The archives will be sealed and transported to your ship as the official property of the Inquisition — for further study and appraisal. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: «Los archivos se sellarán y se transportarán a su nave como propiedad oficial de la Inquisición, para su estudio y evaluación en detalle. Emelina... es responsabilidad mía».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「アーカイブは封印し、異端審問庁の公式動産として陛下の船に移送した上で更なる研究と評価が行われます。エメリナさんのことは…我の責任です」
languages.original_text: "The archives will be sealed and transported to your ship as the official property of the Inquisition — for further study and appraisal. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: 「アーカイブは封印し、異端審問庁の公式動産として陛下の船に移送した上で更なる研究と評価が行われます。エメリナさんのことは…我の責任です」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Les archives étant désormais la propriété officielle de l'Inquisition, elles seront scellées et chargées dans votre vaisseau afin qu'elles puissent être étudiées et soumises à approbation. Emelina... est ma responsabilité. »
languages.original_text: "The archives will be sealed and transported to your ship as the official property of the Inquisition — for further study and appraisal. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: « Les archives étant désormais la propriété officielle de l'Inquisition, elles seront scellées et chargées dans votre vaisseau afin qu'elles puissent être étudiées et soumises à approbation. Emelina... est ma responsabilité. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Die Archive werden versiegelt und als offizielles Eigentum der Inquisition auf Euer Schiff gebracht – zur weiteren Untersuchung und Bewertung. Emelina ... fällt in meine Verantwortung."
languages.original_text: "The archives will be sealed and transported to your ship as the official property of the Inquisition — for further study and appraisal. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: "Die Archive werden versiegelt und als offizielles Eigentum der Inquisition auf Euer Schiff gebracht – zur weiteren Untersuchung und Bewertung. Emelina ... fällt in meine Verantwortung."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Engizisyon'un resmî malı olarak arşivler, üzerilerinde çalışılmak ve değerlendirilmek üzere mühürlenecek ve gemine taşınacak. Emelina... Benim sorumluluğum."
languages.original_text: "The archives will be sealed and transported to your ship as the official property of the Inquisition — for further study and appraisal. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: "Arşivler, Engizisyon'un resmî malı olarak, üzerilerinde çalışılmak ve değerlendirilmek üzere mühürlenecek ve gemine taşınacak. Emelina... Benim sorumluluğum."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
